resources.string: Software Technology Park (12th Floor),\nKawran Bazar,\nDhaka, Bangladesh
Bangladesh Bureau of Educational Information and Statistics (BANBESIS)

Bangladesh Bureau of Educational Information and Statistics (BANBEIS), the only government organization responsible for collection, compilation and dissemination of educational information and statistics.

Many development programmes have been taken to implement ‘vision 2021’-a far-sighted plan by the leader and Honorable Prime Minister of the People’s Republic of Bangladesh, Sheikh Hasina. The government has marked education sector as the most important sector. As a part of this, modern education policy has been dropted to ensure the right of education for all. Female education has become widespread in our country. Many practical measures have been taken to attract all the learners, including female learners to education.
Directorate of Secondary and Higher Education (মাধ্যমিক ও উচ্চশিক্ষা অধিদপ্তর)
Mobile banking for providing stipend to the students
Disburshment of TeleTalk Sim free of cost
Income generating skill-training during study period

Conventional (Traditional) banking system was the way to provide stipend money to the students; but Higher Secondary Stipend Project is the pioneer project for introducing mobile banking in this arena. The benefit of this mobile banking cash transfer system helps to eliminate the leakage of money, saves huge time,money and man days hours, avoid the system jams. The students are capable to learn mobile banking literacy and grow their saving attitudes. Students are highly satisfied because they are receiving the full amount of money with smiling face.

Reducing bank service charge is one of the most important phenomenon of the history of bank service charge rate. Existing bank service charge rate in various project with the respective bank is 2.5 percent. But HSSP is different here. Agreement between HSSP and Agrani Bank is only 1 percent interms of bank service charge.

Introducing of new software and website is a basic change of the system of data collection and making the way easier to process data. The project collects the stipend data within 2 steps from the Institutions developing an effective Software and created a data-base for disbursing money smoothly and transparently disrupting the traditional systems where 23 steps needed to collect the data from 7.2 thousands institutions from all over the country.It has saved money, time and man days hours.

(MOU) signing between HSSP and TeleTalk to disbursh TeleTalk Sim free of cost to the students is a significant achievement for providing stipend money to the students. Regarding disburshment of money through mobile banking mobile sim is a necessary thing.

Intrducing new APPS is a significant achievement for providing stipend to the stipend recipient through mobile banking. HSSP stored various information of related Institutions for exchanging information with the Head of the Institutions. It makes the way easier to process data successfully.

The main innovation of this project is providing part time professional income- generating skill based training to the stipend recipient pro-poor students for earning money to continue their education smoothly, meeting the educational and other expenses. Already two hundred students are provided training on dress-making, Beautification, Mobile phone servicing, Nursery, Sweet making, ICT based out sourcing, poultry, Motor-mechanics on pilot basis in the 10 centers in the country with the collaboration of Access to Information (a2i) Program, Prime Minister`s Office, Bangladesh.

HSSP (Higher secondary Stipend Project) engaged with providing stipend to the poor and pro- poor students with a view to continuing their study,delaing marriage,reducing disparity between male and female, enhancing the scope for employment and self employment opportunities, encouraging women to participate in socio-economic activities together with men and above all to achieve gender equality and empowerment of women . So the stipend program has become one of the effective tools for educating the poor students and has already been proved a useful social safety-net program of Bangladesh. The present democratic Government has introduced the Higher Secondary Stipend Project as a useful and priority based program. The achievements are as follows :

1. Bangladesh Bureau of Educational Information and Statistics (BANBEIS).\n2. The only government organization responsible for collection, compilation and dissemination of educational information and statistics.

১। আপনার অ্যাকাউন্ট পাসওয়ার্ড কারো সাথে শেয়ার করবেন না। 
২। অ্যাকাউন্ট খোলার সময় মোবাইল নাম্বার সঠিকভাবে দিন। 
৩। মোবাইল বা সিম হারিয়ে গেলে জেলা শহরের DBBL এর প্রতিনিধির সাথে যোগাযোগ করুন অথবা ১৬২১৬ নাম্বারে কল করুন। 
৪। উপবৃত্তি পাওয়ার পর যথাশিগ্রই সকল টাকা উত্তোলন করে ফেলুন। 
৫। আপনার এই রকেট অ্যাকাউন্টে অন্যান্য রকেট অ্যাকাউন্টের মত ব্যাংকিং এর সকল সুযোগ-সুবিধাই পাবেন।
2. Do not try with wrong pin more than three times
